content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I understand that you are looking for a place to rent in Mannheim. Could you please tell me what kind of apartment you are looking for and what your budget is?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I am looking for a 25 square meter apartment. My budget is 600 Euro per month. I am a student and I want to live in a clean and quiet area. I am also looking for a reliable and responsible tenant.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I see, thank you for the information. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would suggest a rental price of 700 Euro per month. This price takes into consideration the cost of utilities and other expenses associated with living in Mannheim. Additionally, I believe that this price is competitive with other similar apartments in the area.

However, if you are looking for a lower rental price, I am willing to negotiate. Please let me know what your budget is and what you are willing to pay.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 650 Euro per month. But I am not sure if I can afford the apartment. I would like to make sure that I can afford the rent before I sign the lease. Can you provide me with a breakdown of the expenses that I would be responsible for while living in the apartment?

I also want to make sure that the apartment is clean and well-maintained. I would like to see some photos of the apartment before I make a decision. Can you provide me with some photos?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Of course, I understand your concerns. I can provide you with a breakdown of the expenses that you would be responsible for while living in the apartment. These expenses would include rent, utilities, and any other charges that may be associated with the apartment.

Regarding the photos, I can provide you with some photos of the apartment. However, it is important to note that the photos may not be completely accurate and that the apartment may appear differently in person. I recommend coming to see the apartment in person before making a decision.

As for the rental price, I am willing to negotiate. If you are comfortable with the rental price of 650 Euro per month, I am happy to accept that price. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
